text: Hagi nagra Jeremaia'na agonaraminku'ene ka'ma kokampima sipisipima kegavama nehaza mopagura nasunkura nehu'na zavira ategahue. Na'ankure anampina mago zana omanegeno vahemo'enena vano osigeno bulimakao afu'mofo agerura omanegeno, namaramimo'zane afi zaga kafamo'zanena maka kore atre'za fre vagare'sagu anara hugahue.
